function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Personnel reporting to work after testing positive for the virus","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading the contagious disease within the workplace","Mitigation":"Enforce strict policies requiring personnel to stay home after testing positive, and provide support for remote work if possible.","Technologies":"Monitoring systems to track and enforce quarantine measures, telecommuting technologies for remote work.","People":"Personnel, co-workers, and others in the workplace.","Owner":"Employers, health and safety agencies."},{"Description":"Employers not enforcing social distancing","Impact":"Higher likelihood of contagion and spread of the disease among employees in close proximity.","Mitigation":"Implement strict guidelines and protocols for social distancing in the workplace, including physical barriers and floor markings.","Technologies":"Contact tracing technologies, proximity sensing devices, and virtual queuing systems.","People":"Employees and anyone visiting the workplace.","Owner":"Employers, health and safety agencies."},{"Description":"Employers not providing necessary PPE and hygiene facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to the virus and inadequate protection for employees.","Mitigation":"Ensure availability of masks, gloves, face shields, hand-wash facilities, and sanitizers. Implement regular PPE training and ensure compliance.","Technologies":"Touchless technology for hand-washing and sanitizing, RFID tracking for PPE inventory and distribution.","People":"Employees and visitors to the workplace.","Owner":"Employers, health and safety agencies."}]}
